item.title: Advent of code 2020
item.description: This year I'll be taking part in the Advent of Code - and in order to keep it fun I've set my own rules for taking part…

item.title: New site
item.description: After a long time with nothing but a redirect to a LinkedIn profile 2020 is the year to have a web presence again.
